Uh Veratis I'm trying to denig the proto humans ever
happened and you're not making it any easier. I'm
saying NM just tripped on a piece of exposed siver
(you can keep the dna though).

--- CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote:
> Veratis laughs an evil laugh at the young
> protohuman. "I look forward to
> your feeble atempt, by then it should be time for me
> to feed again." With
> those words the old transformer turned and flew off
> toward his ship to fast
> for the child to follow. The drones took a moment to
> scoop up some
> protohuman DNA for Veratis' experiments before
> following him back to base.
> 
> OOC, I'm gonna take a few days off, Until I return I
> leave my bots at the
> Black fortress in Airlys capable hands.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>

> > > as he observed the findings. "It seems that
> these

> his
> > > chamber each night. "It

> > > draining him of every last

> caused

> > >

> the
